org.spongepowered.api.event.impl

Class AbstractHealEntityEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.event.impl.AbstractEvent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cancellable, HealEntityEvent, TargetEntityEvent, Event

    public abstract class AbstractHealEntityEvent
extends AbstractModifierEvent<HealthFunction,HealthModifier>
implements HealEntityEvent

      • getOriginalHealingModifierAmount

        public final double getOriginalHealingModifierAmount(HealthModifier healthModifier)
        Description copied from interface: HealEntityEvent
        Gets the original healing amount for the provided HealthModifier. If the provided HealthModifier was not included in HealEntityEvent.getOriginalHealingAmounts(), an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Specified by:
        getOriginalHealingModifierAmount in interface HealEntityEvent
        Parameters:
        healthModifier - The original healing modifier
        Returns:
        The original healing change

      • getOriginalFinalHealAmount

        public final double getOriginalFinalHealAmount()
        Description copied from interface: HealEntityEvent
        Gets the original "final" amount of healing after all original HealthModifiers are applied to HealEntityEvent.getOriginalHealAmount(). The "final" heal amount is considered the amount gained by the Entity, if health is tracked.
        Specified by:
        getOriginalFinalHealAmount in interface HealEntityEvent
        Returns:
        The final amount of healing to originally deal

      • getOriginalHealingAmounts

        public final Map<HealthModifier,Double> getOriginalHealingAmounts()
        Description copied from interface: HealEntityEvent
        Gets an Map of all original HealthModifiers and their associated "modified" heal amount. Note that ordering is not retained.
        Specified by:
        getOriginalHealingAmounts in interface HealEntityEvent
        Returns:
        An immutable map of the original modified heal amounts

      • getFinalHealAmount

        public final double getFinalHealAmount()
        Description copied from interface: HealEntityEvent
        Gets the final heal amount that will be applied to the entity. The final heal amount is the end result of the HealEntityEvent.getBaseHealAmount() being applied in DoubleUnaryOperator.applyAsDouble(double) available from all the Tuples of HealthModifier to DoubleUnaryOperator in HealEntityEvent.getOriginalFunctions().
        Specified by:
        getFinalHealAmount in interface HealEntityEvent
        Returns:
        The final heal amount to deal

      • isModifierApplicable

        public final boolean isModifierApplicable(HealthModifier healthModifier)
        Description copied from interface: HealEntityEvent
        Checks whether the provided HealthModifier is applicable to the current available HealthModifiers.
        Specified by:
        isModifierApplicable in interface HealEntityEvent
        Parameters:
        healthModifier - The health modifier to check
        Returns:
        True if the health modifier is relevant to this event

      • getHealAmount

        public final double getHealAmount(HealthModifier healthModifier)
        Description copied from interface: HealEntityEvent
        Gets the heal amount for the provided HealthModifier. Providing that HealEntityEvent.isModifierApplicable(HealthModifier) returns true, the cached "heal amount" for the HealthModifier is returned.
        Specified by:
        getHealAmount in interface HealEntityEvent
        Parameters:
        healthModifier - The heal amount modifier to get the heal amount for
        Returns:
        The modifier

      • setHealAmount

        public final void setHealAmount(HealthModifier healthModifier,
                                DoubleUnaryOperator function)
        Description copied from interface: HealEntityEvent
        Sets the provided DoubleUnaryOperator to be used for the given HealthModifier. If the HealthModifier is already included in HealEntityEvent.getModifiers(), the DoubleUnaryOperator replaces the existing function. If there is no HealthFunction for the HealthModifier, a new one is created and added to the end of the list of DoubleUnaryOperators to be applied to the HealEntityEvent.getBaseHealAmount().

        If needing to create a custom HealthModifier is required, usage of the HealthModifier.Builder is recommended.

        Specified by:
        setHealAmount in interface HealEntityEvent
        Parameters:
        healthModifier - The heal amount modifier
        function - The function to map to the modifier

      • getBaseHealAmount

        public double getBaseHealAmount()
        Description copied from interface: HealEntityEvent
        Gets the "base" healing amount to apply to the targeted Entity. The "base" heal amount is the original value before passing along the chain of DoubleUnaryOperators for all known HealthModifiers.
        Specified by:
        getBaseHealAmount in interface HealEntityEvent
        Returns:
        The base heal amount

      • setBaseHealAmount

        public final void setBaseHealAmount(double baseHealAmount)
        Description copied from interface: HealEntityEvent
        Sets the "base" healing amount to apply to the targeted Entity. The "base" heal amount is the original value passed along the chain of DoubleUnaryOperators for all known HealthModifiers.
        Specified by:
        setBaseHealAmount in interface HealEntityEvent
        Parameters:
        baseHealAmount - The base heal amount
